phase_intent.purpose: Transition FjordHQ from mechanism discovery to signal synthesis under constraint
phase_intent.core_question: Can FjordHQ construct economically meaningful signal candidates using only what is already known to be true?

uma_may: Construct composite shadow signals by combining one or more canonical dimensions
Frame signals as: eligibility conditions, exclusion rules, confidence dampeners
Propose at most 2 shadow signals per week
proposal_requirements: Why the combination is logically valid
Under which conditions the signal is not applicable

explicit_prohibitions.principle: This is signal construction, not signal exploitation

success_criteria.minimum_requirement: At least one synthesized signal that is internally coherent, grounded in known failure structure, and survives CEO scrutiny without revision

strategic_positioning.phase_significance: Final phase before any discussion of validation capital, paper execution, authority escalation, or system autonomy
strategic_positioning.principle: If FjordHQ cannot synthesize disciplined signals from known truth, it has not earned the right to act
